fullDescription.intro: This node allows you to parse the sdml formatted text documents (for more details see the dml.dtd). The specified directory will be searched for xml, gz or zip files, if recursive search is activated the subdirectories are going to be searched too. All the contained xml, gz or zip files are parsed. The document data is stored in the outgoing data table.
fullDescription.option: Set the directory containing the files to parse.
If checked, the specified directory is searched for files recursively.
Specifies the category of the documents.
Specifies the source of the documents.
Specifies the type of the documents.

ports.outPort: An output table containing the parsed document data.
